description: The Tower of Justice is the main building at Enies Lobby where CP9 operates. It's a massive structure where Nico Robin was held captive and where the climactic battles between the Straw Hat Pirates and CP9 take place.

keyEvents.title: Nami vs Kalifa Battle
keyEvents.description: Nami battles CP9's Kalifa inside the Tower of Justice, discovering water as the weakness to Kalifa's soap powers.
keyEvents.significance: One of the key battles at Enies Lobby, showcasing Nami's intelligence and combat growth.

keyEvents.title: Chopper's Monster Point Rampage
keyEvents.description: Chopper in Monster Point crashes through multiple rooms in the Tower of Justice, causing widespread destruction.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the chaos and interconnected nature of the battles happening throughout the tower.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Lucci Battle
keyEvents.description: The epic confrontation between Luffy and Rob Lucci continues in the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: The main battle of the arc representing the struggle between freedom and World Government control.

statusHistory.reason: Tower is operational during the Enies Lobby battle
